wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Alfred Potts (1878 – before 1939) was an English footballer who played for Belgian clubs Antwerp and Beerschot AC. He was topscorer in the Belgian First Division in the 1900–01 and 1901–02 seasons. He featured in at minimum two unofficial matches with the Belgian national team between 1901 and 1904, in which he scored 11 goals.He returned to England and worked in the import business.
